doc:
Tiny countdown with visual indicator

Download: [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/TinyCountdown.spoon.zip](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/TinyCountdown.spoon.zip)

Method.doc:
Start a countdown for `minutes` minutes immediately. Calling this method again will kill the existing countdown instance.

Parameters:
 * minutes - How many minutes
stripped_doc: Start a countdown for `minutes` minutes immediately. Calling this method again will kill the existing countdown instance.
